typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as short,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as short,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as short,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as integer,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Default = '',
		notava = '',
		filename = rtrim($filename,'.csv')+'_'+toString(currentTimestamp())+'.csv') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'filename',
	mapColumn(
		ProjectID,
		Context,
		{Type of tool},
		{Area of change},
		{Service themes},
		{Date of data collection},
		id,
		Course_name,
		Username,
		Email,
		{Phone number},
		Title,
		{First name},
		{Middle name},
		{Last name},
		idnumber,
		Gender,
		{Year of birth},
		{Organization/ Company name},
		{Type of entity},
		{Sub-type of entity},
		{Professional status},
		Functional_title,
		Howlong,
		Priorexperience,
		Address,
		Cityname,
		Country,
		{Country code},
		Pobox,
		Postalcode,
		Nationality,
		Skype,
		Aim,
		Yahoo,
		Msn,
		Profile_field_Supervisor,
		{Service theme} = Default,
		Cityregion = Default,
		{Job title} = Default,
		Size = Default,
		Certification_date = Default,
		Certified = Default,
		Cohort = Default,
		Uniqueid = Default,
		User_id = Default,
		Enrol_time = Default
	)) ~> sink1
